summary: Implements a ConvNeXt building block that combines depthwise convolution, layer normalization, pointwise linear layers, and optional residual connections to form a reusable component in modern convolutional neural networks.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly assemble high‑performance computer‑vision models by providing a ready‑to‑use ConvNeXt block for feature extraction in image classification, detection, and related AI tasks.
